method.description: Method by which diagnosis was carried out.

foetalAge.description: Assessed age of the foetus or length of the pregnancy (in days).

foetusCount.description: If specified, contains the number of foetuses observed.

foetusCountMale.description: If specified, contains number of foetuses observed as male.

foetusCountFemale.description: If specified, contains number of foetuses observed as female.

exceptions.description: Additional local observations - such as ABNORMAL CALF
